name: Color Fuse Longwear Hydrating Glassy Lip + Cheek Blush Balm Stick
about: What it is: A serum-based, high-pigment blush with more than 70% skincare and proprietary complexes that hydrate and make skin look plumper, all in a long-wearing, glassy balm...Highlighted Ingredients: - Fermented Arnica: Visibly reduces redness and irritation..- Goji Berry Complex: Boosts radiance and makes skin look plumper..- Fermented Shiunko: Promotes collagen synthesis and antioxidant protection...Ingredient Callouts: This product is vegan, gluten-free, and cruelty-free...What Else You Need to Know: Born as a skincare serum stick, this blush delivers high-performance color while goji berry complex makes skin look more plump and fermented arnica visibly reduces redness and irritation. This cream blush stick immediately boosts skin hydration by +62%...Clinical Results: Based on a 3rd party consumer perception clinical study of 35 panelists ages 18-45 after application:.- 94% agree it provides sheer, medium buildable coverage.- 94% agree it feels weightless on skin all day.- 91% agree it provides all-day moisture + hydration with a healthy glow..Clean.Our commitment to offering formulas that go beyond regulatory standards to avoid controversial ingredients without sacrificing effectiveness.
ingredients: -Fermented Arnica: Visibly reduces redness and irritation..-Goji Berry Complex: Boosts radiance and makes skin look plumper..-Fermented Shiunko: Promotes collagen synthesis and antioxidant protection...Diisostearyl Malate, Octyldodecanol, Polyglyceryl-2 Triisostearate, Synthetic Wax, Caprylic/Capric.Triglyceride, Propylene Glycol Dibenzoate, Polybutene, Bis-Behenyl/Isostearyl/Phytosteryl Dimer.Dilinoleyl Dimer Dilinoleate, Euphorbia Cerifera Cera, (Euphorbia Cerifera (Candelilla) Wax Cire de.Candelilla), Polyglyceryl-6 Polyricinoleate, Coco-Caprylate/Caprate, Arnica Montana Flower Extract**,.Squalane, Pseudozyma Epicola/Camellia Sinensis Seed Oil Ferment Extract Filtrate, Pseudozyma.Epicola/Apricot Kernel Oil/Olive Fruit Oil/Sweet Almond Oil/Sunflower Seed Oil/Licorice Root Extract.Ferment Extract Filtrate, Pseudozyma Epicola/Apricot Kernel Oil/Olive Fruit Oil/Sunflower Seed.Oil/Sweet Almond Oil/(Angelica Gigas/Lithospermum Erythrorhizon) Root Extract Ferment Extract.Filtrate, Pseudozyma Epicola/Sunflower Seed Oil Ferment Extract Filtrate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Lycium.Barbarum Fruit Extract, Copernicia Cerifera Cera (Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax, Cire De.Carnauba), Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Caprylic/Capric/Succinic Triglyceride, Castor Oil/IPDI.Copolymer, Propylene Carbonate, Sorbitan Sesquioleate, Stearalkonium Hectorite, 1,2-Hexanediol, CI.77492 (Iron Oxides), CI 77891 (Titanium Dioxide), CI 15985 (Yellow 6 Lake), CI 15850 (Red 7 Lake), CI.42090 (Blue 1 Lake)..**Fermented..The list of ingredients is subject to change. Please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.For cheeks:.-Glide onto skin..-Blend away any harsh lines using your fingers, the HAUS LABS Dual-Ended Multi-Purpose Brush (sold separately), or a makeup sponge. .-Layer to intensify color. ..For lips:.-Tap and blend into lips for a subtle wash of color. .-For more intense pigment, swipe directly onto lips.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Porcelain skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm honestly floored by how well this worked for me. First, I was shocked this shade worked so well for me: I have pretty fair skin with cool undertones and was fairly certain I'd just look like a pumpkin, but I'm really glad I tried it on in the store. I don't use much product, and when I blend it out, it's still orange, but close enough of a neighbor to coral in a really beautiful way that it's not overwhelming or clownish (no shade to the clowns out there, it's just not my journey). Definitely unique to my collection. It looks intimidating, but don't be scared! I encourage you to at least try it on if your local store has a tester (don't forget to use the alcohol provided to sanitize) because you might be surprised! Also, because it looks so intense, it's more likely to be in stock. At my local store, some shades were sold out or down to the last one or two, but there was a stack of these guys.  I use this product sparingly, applying two little dots to bare skin on each cheek (barely a tap, each), and use my fingers to blend/tap them to disperse. From there, it's easy to add a bit to build, if desired, or to add some to even out if you feel like the blend was uneven (for me, this is due to user error, not product quality). So far, I've gone in with the stick directly on the face with my initial two dots (amount will vary, that's just what works for my face size/shape/pigmentation), and use a finger to gather any additional product to add for more control over the amount.   I was also pleasantly surprised by the longevity of this product. I went out with the girls for some very spirited karaoke for my birthday wearing this blush. We were out for hours, it was hot, and I was S W E A T I N G. I'd touched my face and had to blot sweat off on numerous occasions, so I was sure that it must have disappeared, but lo and behold, I looked in the mirror when I got home and it was still on my face, only a little faded.

You get such a little amount of product considering how much you have to use.

reviews.review_text: I love a balmy glossy blush. I love a healthy, glowy finish. This blush, which swatched *beautifully*  on my wrist, was awful on my face no matter how I applied it. This is a buttery blush, but not in an easy to blend and creamy way: it looks and feels like I took a big scoop of pink butter and rubbed it all over my cheeks.  They do not read as healthy in person and instead look very greasy and waxy. The stained glass finish looks to hover over skin, not be a glimpse at a glowy skin below.   Points for beautiful shades, though! The Pat McGrath cream blushes are a great option for a balm stick blush that has a healthy finish and will not pick up your base if you're smart about application. The Rhode blush in juice box is a great color swap for Glassy Rosette, though not exact.

reviews.review_text: Love the milky berry Glassy Hibiscus shade for a soft blush that lasts. When used with any foundation product, I recommend patting it on and lightly blending with a brush or fingers, NOT directly from the stick as it will lift foundation.  Whilst I adore the shade and like the formula, I don't think it's quite as long-lasting or easy to apply as the Tower 28 BeachPlease cream blushes; plus, it's also $14 more expensive.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the sheerness of this new formula, and the added hydration & glow that it provides. The shades are gorgeous and buildable, although I will say that the powder formula is much stronger and provides a much more distinguishable blush. I tried both the pomelo and the pitaya shades, and the pomelo blended a little too much into my natural skin tone. The pitaya stood out a bit more for my fairer skin, but still took a few applications before it was noticeable. Sometimes blush can be really overpowering however so I enjoy the fact that this stick is more sheer. It felt great and blended easily. I think my sponge soaked up a bit of the product however, so I recommend just using your fingers and a gentle ‘tapping’ motion to blend out. As you can tell from my photo, the blush was not super noticeable but provided a nice ‘sun touched’ glow to my skin. This was after two applications and blending. I think for bolder looks I will stick to the powder, but I do enjoy this option for a more natural look & look forward to using it more!

reviews.review_text: These have a lot of pigment. I didn’t think I needed another blush but couldn’t resist these! They are more opaque and creamy than some other recent blush releases, especially the Milk jelly sticks. This is a true bright orange but appears a bit pinky on my cheeks since I lean pink. I usually buy more pinks on cheeks and lips but I couldn’t resist this lovely, vibrant orange shade. I bought Pitaya as well, and they make a lovely combo used together or alone! In this first photo, I’m using Tangelo on cheeks and lips, then in the second photo shows after blotting lips and the stain left behind. You can see how opaque it is. These are long lasting and can go from sheer wash of color to very pigmented depending on application. I used a blush brush to apply on cheeks and fingers to apply on lips. I purchased these on my own and I’m sharing my honest and authentic opinion as a Sephora Beauty Insider Community Ambassador. Really pretty and long lasting!

reviews.review_text: I love how creamy and easy application is to put straight on your face or with a full face of foundation! Super blend and once it says, it literally does not go anywhere for me. The color selection is beautiful as well!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am 62 years old and I have tried every product under the sun and every stick/creme blush from Chanel to Nyx. I recently purchased the Haus Labs Foundation and was absolute blown away. It gives my Chanel no1 a run for the money so I had to try this Lip+Cheek Balm. It is FANTASTIC. Not only is it the perfect color match for my lips (and it actually lasts on my dry lips), it is the perfect, buildable color pay off on the cheeks. I have sun spots on both of my cheeks to I have to work hard to cover first with foundation and then concealer. Tricky for me to apply creme blushes without it stripping off my application but this stick blush, first applied to the back of my hand and then dabbed on with a brush applied seamlessly. It is the perfect consistency without being overly glassy. I like a dewey finish but if it gets too glassy on my older skin, it just looks silly. I am so impressed with Haus Lab; worth every penny and I can hardly believe they are CLEAN PRODUCTS.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I mainly wore this cheeks but honestly,this is one of the best and blush sticks. I’ve used so far! It also has a light fruity smelt it as well. It’s buildable and blends very easily. Definitely want to purchase another colour 🥰￼

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely worth the money I used this on top of the kosas tint I just used my fingers to blend it is seem less it feels like a balm but sets like a powder unlike some balm blushes that still feel sticky this does not iam in love

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This blush balm is so beautiful and intuitive to apply! I opted to apply by brush, but you can use the stick or your fingers. The balm is pigmented but can blend from medium to sheer coverage effortlessly without leaving streaks or patches. The glass effect is perfect for the summer and “no makeup, makeup days”. The shade Pitaya is a beautiful bright cool pink that looks stunning on my skin tone. Love this so much, I’ll be buying another color! With all Haus Lab products, I just love the innovation and skincare. ingredients that works so well on my dry, mature skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love these blushes but with the glassy pitaya you need to apple brush to stick method otherwise you’ll have a harsh line that will not blend out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using the Haus Labs Blush Stick, and it's fantastic. This serum-based, high-pigment blush is over 70% skincare, making my skin look plumper and hydrated. The fermented arnica helps reduce redness, while the goji berry complex boosts radiance. I love that it's vegan, gluten-free, and cruelty-free. It provides sheer, buildable coverage, feels weightless, and keeps my skin hydrated all day with a healthy glow. Highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Separated once applied onto my face with foundation on it.

reviews.review_title: It’s ok but a one time purchase for me
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The color payout is great but it doesn’t last long on my skin. Texture is very nice and product does blend well. Just doesn’t have a long life once applied. Not sure the $34 price tag is worth it.

reviews.review_title: Amazing blush! My favorite right now
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I bought it after watching Adi’s review. This is such a beautiful color for brown/tan skin and applies effortlessly. I have been using it since the day I bought it. Love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am completely in love with these they make such a beautiful blush. They last all day super lightweight and they stay in place. There’s nothing more I could ask for especially when it comes to blush. I am excited about this blush. It’s clean and gradients. It’s everything I look for a blush and a glides on like silk I absolutely love This and I would highly recommend it to anybody

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: These blushes have a lovely formula. The shade is pigmented enough to only need a little color and blends out so easily. As a lip balm it’s smooth without any stickiness. It looks similar to a lip tint with a creamy lip balm texture

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: These blushes have a lovely formula. The shade is pigmented enough to only need a little color and blends out so easily. As a lip balm it’s smooth without any stickiness. It looks similar to a lip tint with a creamy lip balm texture.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love the color fuse glassy blush balm stick. It’s easy to apply for light color or keep building for more.   I don’t usually wear blush but after I tried this I put it back in my makeup routine. I am wearing glassy hibiscus .   I received this product free to try for my opinion.

reviews.review_title: A must for natural makeup & FULL BEAT
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: These are phenomenal! I love that they can be used on bare skin, no makeup makeup, and full glam! If you are on the fence just go for it. Definitely the best cream blush or blush stick I’ve ever used!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Such a stunning deep cherry shade! This is very pigmented, but can also easily be blended out to soften.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted these amazing Color Fuse Glassy Blush Balms from the besties at Haus Labs. But let me tell you how they don’t even feel like you’re wearing anything. Well, anything but skincare. They don’t feel sticky and they don’t smear at all. They blend beautifully and they’re so highly pigmented. Glassy Hibiscus is perfect on me and Glassy Tangelo is about to be my go-to when I’m nice and tan this summer. They feel hydrating and so soft. I can’t wait to snag a few more colors of these. They’re such a nice touch on your lips and cheeks too when you’re not feeling a full face. Love these, 12/10!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I knew this product was going to be amazing. Haus Labs knows what they’re doing with blush (and every product). I wasn’t expecting a new line of blush anytime soon but I’m so happy they released these glassy balms and decided to send me this color. Having the balm stick such a nice alternative to a matte look with the pressed powders, it’s also a little easier for on the go touchups! I loved the Hibiscus Haze product in the pressed blush and the glassy Hibiscus color did not disappoint. Definitely want to experiment with more colors as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: New favourite everyday blush! Layers well on top of other makeup and on bare skin. It’s dewy but it still lasts all day!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This blush creates the perfect glowy/subtle blush but still has some pigment to it. It makes the skin look so glowy and healthy and it contains such a unique formula in my opinion. Even after setting it the glow still shines through, I feel like this is a perfect blush for the natural days where you wanna add a bit of color and glow from within but don’t want to overdue it. Truly such a beautiful formula

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am so impressed with this, it looks so pretty and natural and I LOVE that it includes skincare benefits!! I can literally use it on cheeks, lips, and eyes for an effortless monochrome moment

reviews.review_title: Please add more product it’s very little
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product but it’s true it’s very little product and while I love the colors and formula, I am not sure I can accept keeping it with such little formula. This needs to be a lot bigger to justify the price.

This is such a beautiful formula, however to ask for this much money for little product is truly not worth it. A little going a long way truly does not justify the price point. Please add more product!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, gray hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Disclaimer: I was gifted this by Haus Labs in exchange for my honest review.   I really love this blush for one big reason. It's blurring! The texture on my cheekbones can be very bumpy and rough so I've always been hesitant about what products I apply in that area because I don't want to attract attention to the texture. I feel like the Haus Labs Glass Lip & Cheek Blush Balm Stick blurs the texture on my cheeks so an immediate 10/10 for me! Now I was gifted the Glassy Hibiscus shade which I LOVE mauves. It's very light and I would say depending on how you blend you may need to build it to get to the intensity you want. Which I think is a good think especially in the summer with how hot it gets, your skin can really breath with this formula. I also appreciate how sturdy the case is. The texture of the stick is surprisingly very soft, not squishy but something that I would not want to get loose in my makeup bag while traveling. LUCKILY, the Haus Labs packaging is very sturdy and gives a nice click when you put the cap back on. Traveled with it recently and no accidents in my makeup bag! I was gifted the Glassy Hibiscus shade but I would love to get another shade or two because the formula is so neat and new!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted Glassy Pomelo and Glassy Açaí. The Açaí makes for an amazing lip color on my skin tone. The Pomelo gives just the right amount and shape of color. I’ve been getting so many compliments. I never thought I’d use anything that wasn’t a powder blush until now!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this because one I love what I own so far from HausLabs, and two I was hoping to get that juicy dewy cream blush look but unfortunately it sheered out into nothing, I applied two ways, directly on top of my foundation but I felt it lifted my foundation a bit. The other way I applied it was from the brush to my cheek and that was better but I didn't get the color payoff I was hoping for. Maybe the other shades are different but I am returning it, it just wasn't what I thought it would be. Its pretty but not a game changer especially for someone like me who has a large variation of cream blushes in my makeup collection.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I loveeee Gaga. She really knows what she’s doing. This blush had such a nice dewy natural glow to it. The color can be sheer or built up to a more saturated look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: It is so hard to find a true cool pink cream blush, I thought this would be amazing. The color itself is beautiful, but it really is a product that requires you build the coverage. The packaging is pretty cheap feeling and the amount of product you get for $30+ is not worth it when you consider how much you have to use. It was also difficult to blend, and became extremely patchy over the course of the day every time I’ve used it. I don’t normally write reviews, but I had so many problems with this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have this in Glassy Rosette.  Such a pretty pigmented glowy blush.

reviews.review_title: Works as Blush and Lip Color!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this as both a blush and lip color! It’s super pigmented so I apply the blush with a sponge because I like more of a diffused look. I’ll also blot it on my lips for a color stain. Super glassy looking but not oily

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is exactly what it says- long wear, hydrating, and glassy! Tried out for a semi-outdoor event in humid weather and looked gorgeous and lasted!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is one of my favorite blushes!!! It’s a must have for summer, and it comes in all the best shades no matter your skin. I love wearing this to the beach and i always get so many compliments from my friends! 10/10 ♥️🎀

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was a little hesitant to try this product at first, but I'm glad I ended up trying it. The color hibiscus first looks on the purple side, but when applied to the face, I was so glad it looked rosier. This product glides on so smoothly, did not budge all day, and maintained that glassy look at all times. It is also super bendable and very easy to build up in terms of color. I will say, it does not dry fully. It has almost a balm-like consistency when applied to the face, and stays a bit tacky. It wasn't an issue for me, but I'm sure applying setting powder on it would remove that consistency if it's not your preference. That being said, it feels great when applied on the lips! It doesn't dry down patchy when applied to the lips or cheeks. I have a drier skin type and I was glad to see it didn't cling or cause dry patches.  My only con would be the price vs the amount of product we get. It's a great product, but for the amount of product we are getting it is expensive. Overall, I would recommend the product!

reviews.review_title: It’s been a long time I have been this impressed
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Wow, Lady Gaga has outdone herself! These are all so beautiful and pigmented in person! I think I am in love with all of the colors! I am not sure if this is long lasting or not but it’s gorgeous! In fact I like it so much I am going out of my way to pick a couple of really popular sold out colors!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received the two shades Glassy Rosette & Glassy Acai. The one I’m wearing in this photo is Glassy Acai. The pigment on these blushes is so beautiful 😍 I love how they are versatile and can be wore on the lips  as well. I can’t wait to try more shades 😍

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Would have given it a 5 stars if it was long lasting otherwise awesome colour. I bought the peach pink

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: GLASSY Acai is the most beautiful, pigmented and gorgeous shade I have seen..I like to use it both on my cheeks and lips too. It gives my face a nice glassy flush of color that looks like a very healthy glow. I'm Obsessed. kindly gifted by Hauslabs in exchange for my honest opinion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is seriously the best blush I have used in recent time. Soo easily bendable, very pigmented and stays intact. Gives my face a nice glassy glow just like it's name. I'm Obsessed!! Kindly gifted by Hauslabs in exchange for my honest opinion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Claimed to be glossy , but I put it on how I was supposed to and patching and dry on my skin . Was very hopeful it’s was going to be that girl but sadly it wasn’t

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I now have 3 shades of this new cream blush and I am so impressed! To be honest cream blushes are hit or miss for me, they often will apply well but wear quicker than I want and in a patchy way. Not these! I did wear tests and they held up without setting for 10-12 hour time periods and still looked so beautiful without touch ups. The glassy finish I find to actually look quite natural. See the photo below for how glassy watermelon looked after 10 hours!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Such a beautiful color. It’s so smooth and buildable. Love!

reviews.review_title: A new staple in my routine!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this product before a trip and I've been using it nonstop! Really love the color and the texture. This is definitely a buildable product, I use a sponge for a more sheer application and a dense brush for a bit more of a punch. I also love this on my lips! It's just the perfect tint of color and it isn't drying. I'll absolutely be purchasing in other colors!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love love love!!! Lady Gaga you knew what you were doing

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this color is not talked about enough!! I absolutely love it, it’s the perfect mauve on the face, doesn’t appear super deep on the skin. I love the formula of this product. It looks amazing as a natural make up look as well. Highly recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this new blush balm stick! definitely a flawless look when it’s a natural makeup day, the color is perfect and pigment as well. The best summer shade, you NEED it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The color is beautiful but I cant say this is any different from any other cream blush out there. It doesn't last on the lips either. The amount of product is not worth the price honestly.

reviews.review_title: Glassy Rosette is Brown girl friendly xo 🌹
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Now probably when I’m having a no makeup day (I will pop this on), eventually I’ll try it w/powder; but since I’m oily, I will use this for my lips. And let me tell you this color is stunning on my neutral-tan skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got it in Glassy Watermelon. I was a bit apprehensive since I’m so pale, but it looks great on my skin—very natural looking. It’s a bit pricy, I got $10 off my purchase, for the amount of product you get. That’s why I give it 4 stare.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this blush balm stick so much. GLASSY is the best name for it. I was glowing to the moon and it lasted all day which is my most important element of picking a good blush. Rosette and Acai both worked great on my light skin, but I found myself reaching for Rosette more, for cheeks and lips! I am currently pregnant and love feeling good about the ingredients I'm putting on my body as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was lucky enough to receive this product from haus labs. I used this blush multiple times over the last month and it doesn’t disappoint. It is so pigmented and yet still is buildable. It lays so beautifully under and over powder. I’m the photo you can see how truly pigmented it’s before powder. I placed one small dot on my cheek and it gave me this gorgeous natural flush. 100% would recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love it. The finish is so natural. It’s not matte but definitely not overly shiny. It makes my cheeks look glowy and I love the color.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm in love for this blush. I'm using it everyday. It let my skin so natural and beautiful. Will buy more colors for sure!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am loving this blush. The Lilac color is perfect on my medium skin tone and perfect for summer. The pigment is there without being too much.  It's not as emollient and oily as Tower 28. I like Haus better.  It's my new fave and I purchased with my own $.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely loved the color Tangelo!! The product looks beautiful against my skin tone and blends effortlessly. I also like how buildable and pigmented the product is. So, I can wear it to work (like the picture below) or I can build it up a bit to wear out when I want more of a pop. The product is perfectly dewy, allowing for an amazing natural finish. It also lasts all day! 10/10 would recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE THIS BLUSH AND LIP STICK!!! The color is SO good and perfect for everyday. I love that it doubles for both blush and lip too!

reviews.review_title: A new addition to my daily routine
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted this product by Haus Labs but it has very quickly become a staple in my makeup routine. This blush stick is so easy to use and beginner friendly. It looks good on a full face of makeup or even just on bare skin. The formula is creamy and very easily blendable, also one of the MOST hydrating blushes I've ever tried. I just have to apply a few times to get the color I want, so I'd love if they released a more pigmented formula.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I purchased this product as soon as it was available for the very first tym on the sephora app for limited time.. ive been using it regularly since then.. the color payoff is gr8.. its balm like & give a nice flush to my cheeks.i normal

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Got this and Glassy Pitaya. Love how easy it is to blend. It’ll be my go-to for my “no-makeup” days. Only complaint is the orange doesn’t really show as orange on my skin. Maybe it does for others. Regardless… still looks amazing :)

reviews.review_title: Over priced for the amount of product
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The formula is beautiful and looks very radiant on the skin. Its a light-medium buildable coverage and I feel like I have to use several layers to get the pigment I want with a brush. Not worth the price in my opinion.

reviews.review_title: Blush is great but please STOP using USPS to ship.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This blush is wonderful! It blends like a dream, wears well, has the perfect amount of pigment. I love that it has skincare incorporated into it. That’s a huge + for any cosmetic product. However I wish Sephora would stop shipping through USPS. USPS takes forever to get products and that’s if they don’t lose them. That’s the only issue with ordering from Sephora.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The perfect blush for summer! Gives a wonderful glow and is build able. I was gifted these by haus and was sent two colors. The hibiscus was my favorite since I have fair skin!

I was lucky enough to be gifted and try out the Color Fuse Glassy Blush Balm in the shades Glassy Watermelon and Glassy Lilac, and I am in love! This product is the perfect addition to my dewy makeup routine. 10/10 recommend 😇

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: These blushes are super easy to apply and look so gorgeous and dewey. They can be built up and blended out really well. Packaging was really nice and beautiful.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful color but way overpriced by at least $10.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: These blushes are awesome! They glide on so easy with great pigment. Glassy is really the perfect word to describe how this looks; it gives a very dewey and glossy shine in a way other blushes don’t. I was sent the Glassy Lilac and Watermelon shades which I initially didn’t think would suit me but I thought wrong! I love them both and I’m obsessed with the lilac shade. They blend on your skin so smoothly and pair very well with my Haus Labs foundation. It also doubles as a great tinted lip balm! I wore it out to dinner and the pigment stayed pretty well throughout the night! Going to be a new go-to in my makeup bag!  This product was gifted to me by Haus Labs in exchange for an honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This blush is the blush to beat! The Haus Labs COLOR FUSE Glassy Blush Balm Stick in Glassy Rosette is amazing. It glides on the skin like a dream and keeps my skin hydrated and plump all day. The color is sheer, buildable, and feels weightless. Plus, it visibly reduces redness and irritation. Definitely my new favorite!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love glassy, dewy products so I was really excited to try this. The color and formula are really beautiful but it only lasts and hour before it’s completely faded. It’s good for quicks errands but not for a night out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: For the amount of product you get the price is a little steep, but the formula is amazing. I love how pigmented and vibrant the colors are. Very creamy, easy to apply, and I like the glossy finish it gives. Takes a second to blend out, it’s not too much. I’m obsessed.

reviews.review_title: Yes. So easy to work with, light but buildable
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: So pretty and easy to blend. Not too pigmented. I love the versatility. You can leave it as isfor a dewy look or top it with powder! Very shiny & buildable. I deducted a star cuz i feel like it doesnt last as long as some of my other blushes. So i did need to reapply or touch up after 4-6 hrs of wesr.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product does EXACTLY what it’s advertised to do. A little goes a long way with these balm blushes. Dabbing my brush a couple times and blending it onto my upper cheeks creates a beautiful, buildable and hydrated flushed look. It’s long lasting and definitely keep the area hydrated.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Really like the darker colors (glassy açaí, and watermelon) to use as blush and lip color. They are more suited for my contrast. While this is a lovely product I don’t get the glass effect for very long and the product sinks into my dry skin quickly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like it, it has multi uses (lips, cheek). It blends nicely and doesn’t mess up powder products, it doesn’t feel heavy on the skin. My fav is taking a bit on my finger and blotting it on my lips and following g with a clear gloss. Very good!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Really pretty and nice wearing product. Super easy to blend out and very pigmented.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Kinda bummed, I really had high hopes for this but it just turned pink on my skin, didn’t really look lilac at all. I have pink blushes that I love already, also this seemed to catch on dry patches and never gave a glassy effect. Lastly, it was incredibly tiny, rolled all the way up was less than an inch of product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm head over heels for this blush balm stick in shade Rose! The texture is wonderfully smooth, making it a breeze to apply on my skin. It gives a lovely, dewy finish that gives me  a natural, healthy glow to my cheeks. The color intensity is just right—not overly strong but buildable for those times I want a more pronounced look.  What stands out to me the most is how hydrating it feels. My skin tends to be dry, and this blush balm doesn't accentuate any dry areas. Plus, it's incredibly easy to use, and I can even use my fingers to blend it.   I’m also acne-prone so I appreciate it doesn’t contain any pore-clogging ingredients.  It makes my skin glowy, healthy and radiant! Obsessed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely adore this product! It’s easy to use and blends in so well on top of your other makeup. It’s very pigmented and smooth to apply. I definitely recommend this blush! (I received this product for free from Haus Labs in exchange for my honest review).

reviews.review_title: You literally can't mess up with these!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I loved the first one so much, I could not decide which one I loved more, so I kept them both!  Did I need any other blushes, No.  Is this blush absolutely beautiful and easy to apply? YES Did I buy another shade... also YES!  These are absolutely stunning and I love how user friendly they are!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Did I need any other blushes, No.  Is this blush absolutely beautiful and easy to apply? YES Did I buy another shade... also YES!  These are absolutely stunning and I love how user friendly they are!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This blush is great if you want a blush with a more glossy finish, or to use as a base blush if you want a more vibrant look! I’m personally someone who LOVES a good intense blush look, so i used a little bit of the shade glassy watermelon, and I set it with the Color Fuse Blush in the shade watermelon bliss. So if you prefer more of a matte look, I would definitely recommend setting the product with a powder blush. (this product was gifted to me by Haus Labs

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was sent two shades for an honest review and I’m really impressed! They have a beautiful glassy finish upon application and are both extremely pigmented on my skin tone. I have extremely fair skin with pink undertones (I’m usually the fairest shade of any foundation) and find the Glassy Rosette color to look like my natural blush- it’s seriously the most natural looking blush shade I think I’ve ever worn. I also received Glassy Acai which is a cool toned berry and is beautiful but definitely too dark for my complexion.   One thing to point out is they're not quite as moisturizing as I was expecting, so you need to make sure your skin is well moisturized and prepped prior to application. I use quite a bit of skincare so this wasn't an issue for me. Thanks Haus Labs!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was sent two shades for an honest review and I’m really impressed! They have a beautiful glassy finish upon application and are both extremely pigmented on my skin tone. I have extremely fair skin with pink undertones (I’m usually the fairest shade of any foundation) and find the Glassy Rosette color to look like my natural blush- it’s seriously the most natural looking blush shade I think I’ve ever worn. I also received Glassy Acai which is a cool toned berry and is beautiful but definitely too dark for my complexion.   One thing to point out is they're not quite as moisturizing as I was expecting, so you need to make sure your skin is well moisturized and prepped prior to application. I use quite a bit of skincare so this wasn't an issue for me. Thanks Haus Labs!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: For an honest review, I was sent two shades of the color fuse glassy blush balm, and I’m genuinely wondering how I lived so long without these! The formula is so soft and smooth, it feels like i’m not wearing anything at all. I absolutely love gloss, so this hits everything on my checklist! I love that I’m able to choose the same pigment for my lips and cheeks because everything needs to match for me. As a blush, the colors are gorgeous. They’re very pigmented products and you only need a small amount. I wore these to work and in addition to lasting all day, my face felt moisturized and looked dewy. Never going back to traditional blush again, these are revolutionary. Thanks Haus Labs!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I usually never wear anything cream for my blush but these sticks changed my mind. It was super easy to use and very pigmented after one layer. I loved how easy it was to blend out and build up after a layer to do. It gave a beautiful glowing look to my makeup with really made me obsessed with it to where I started to wear it outside of doing makeup and on the go. I can see this being a go to product in my makeup collection.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m always looking forward for a new Haus Labs launch and when they announced this one it got me super excited!!! I love a glassy finish that looks natural on the skin and this one delivers!!! I have all the shades I was kindly gifted and right now I’m obsessed with glossy pomelo! It looks natural, feels phenomenal and super easy to apply! I love that it’s skin care, I love the pigment to it, again, thank you Haus Labs! There’s a reason you’re my favorite makeup brand 🥹❤️

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got three different shades & the packaging is so cheap. For the amount of product you get is so not worth the money. I get there’s skin care benefits but add more product or lower the price. I’m returning them

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this blush! It goes on smoothly, blends easily, and lasts all day. I really appreciate that it can be applied lightly for a sheer look or layered for a more intense color.   I received Glassy Hibiscus and Glassy Tangelo as a gift, and I was pleasantly surprised that both shades complemented my skin beautifully. I was so impressed that I ended up purchasing Glassy Pitaya as well!

reviews.review_title: Sexy on the outside; Basic on the inside
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Haus Labs Glassy Rosette Blush Balm stick certainly impresses with its sleek and sexy packaging, adding a touch of glamour to my makeup collection. The color itself is undeniably gorgeous, offering a natural and subtle hue that enhances the complexion effortlessly. However, for those with very dry skin like myself, the blush may not provide the desired juicy appearance upon application. Instead, it can appear slightly dry on the skin, resulting in a less vibrant color payoff than expected. Despite this, I'm willing to give it another try, planning to prep my skin thoroughly beforehand with skincare to achieve a more radiant and dewy finish.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this blush, but it was just so patchy. It’s definitely glassy, but it just lay smoothly like the powder version.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I loved how easy they were to blend and the color really matched my skin tone! I didn’t need too much or too little which means there’s a ton of product to use!

reviews.review_title: Another Innovative Product from Haus Labs
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I was amazed by how true the word glassy is on this blush--and the glassy-ness lasts all night long! I was gifted this product from Haus Labs and at first I was hesitant as I'm normally not a glossy/dewey kind of guy. I love the Haus Labs powder blush because it is very pigmented, long lasting (without use of cream blushes) and has a blurring effect to them so I was concerned that this would pick up some of my textures, but NO it did not emphasize any texture. I tried them on over a course of few events and different techniques. The picture below is using the stick directly on my skin with foundation on--this I felt was the most pigmented and glassy. I also tried using fingers and was good for a more controlled glow. My favorite technique was using a brush as you can give more dimension and precision as it is very buildable. I also tried this as a highlighter on top of powder blush and yes it gave that glassiness over the blush. I went out to a club and dance all night and did not touch up and it stayed glassy all night.   Other Haus Labs Products used in this photo: TRICLONE™ SKIN TECH MEDIUM COVERAGE FOUNDATION - 325 TRICLONE™ SKIN TECH HYDRATING + DE-PUFFING CONCEALER - 30, 33 BIO-BLURRING LOOSE SETTING POWDER - Translucent POWER SCULPT VELVET BRONZER - 6 HY-POWER PIGMENT PAINT - White Onyx Matte, Scarlet Matte, Sapphire Matte, Citrine Matte, Black Onyx Matte

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I was so impressed by this product - obsessed is an understatement! I was worried about the color initially but it looked so natural on my skin once I blended! I also adore the application stick! I will definitely be recommending to family and friends.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this blush! I am an olive skin tone and the watermelon color gives me that perfect natural sun-kissed look. A must buy!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted a set of Glassy Blush Balms from Haus Labs, and I have to admit, I was initially taken by surprise by the colors. They seemed quite bold, and I wasn’t sure if they would suit me. However, my curiosity got the best of me, and I decided to try out the shade Glassy Tangelo, a vibrant red-orange hue. To my amazement, this shade blended beautifully into a light pink-red blush on my cheeks. The transformation was stunning, and it gave me a flawless, natural-looking flush that complemented my skin tone perfectly. What impressed me even more was the longevity of this blush. I am used to my blush fading by the end of the day, but this product stayed put from morning until evening, still looking as fresh as when I first applied it. The Haus Labs Glassy Blush Balm has definitely earned a spot in my daily makeup routine. Its long-lasting formula and beautiful finish have made it my new go-to blush. Thank you, Haus Labs, for another fantastic product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This blush sits so nicely on the skin! Glassy is correct because it gives a beautiful glass effect to the cheeks and lips. The formula blends so seamlessly with my other base products and the color lasts all day after you set it with some translucent powder!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was lucky enough to try a couple of these thanks to Haus Labs and I absolutely love them! They are so so smooth and very blendable. I love that these can be used as a lip balm as well! Definitely would recommend!!

reviews.review_title: Versatile must have product for summer!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received notification that I was going to receive two of the new color fuse glassy blush balms for an honest review. I was not aware of the colors I would receive until I opened the package. I kept saying I hope I don’t get Glassy Tangelo (and Glassy Hibiscus- one of the ones I really wanted. Well guess what I received? Yep! Glassy Tangelo! And you know what? I looooove it as a blush. It goes on looking a little neon (not quite as neon as in the container) but once you blend it out, it looks great! It is very smooth and blendable and buildable! It is very creamy and smooth and it lasted thru dinner, drinks, and dancing to a live band outside beachside! I also used it as my lip balm that night. And while it wasn’t something I would normally wear on my lips it definitely looked better than I imagined. And it was very smooth and moisturizing on my lips! I definitely think this is a must for your summer makeup/skincare routine! It is moisturizing  and versatile as a blush, lip balm, and an eye shadow/liner. Let products to pack!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted this product by Haus Labs and I am IN LOVE! I’ve never been one to love blush, but the ease and creaminess of this blush balm has won be over!!! A 10/10!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE this formula. This gel-like formula glides on super smooth and leaves you with a lit-from-within shine. I love how easily it diffuses into the skin, great as a topper that doesn't pull or disrupt products underneath.  I was gifted this product in exchange for a product review from Haus Laubs.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely loved this blush, I'm a fan of everything from this brand, but this is perfect for summer 10/10 recommend. It blended and preformed very well with the other products I used.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted this by Haus Labs, and at first I was very sceptical about this color because it looks rather “neon” at first glance. I had a concert to go to and this color was almost identical to the one on my boots and dress trimming, so I decided to try it for that occasion and WOW!! It is seriously so beautiful and subtle on the skin. It blended so smoothly and perfectly without a lot of pressure on the brush, and I feel like it blended into my skin and made it glowy! I’m going to want to try every color now. It’s very much like putting a skin care balm on, doesn’t feel heavy or sticky in any way. It’s also really easy to carry around on the go/ traveling because you don’t even need a tool for this, your fingers will work perfect. I love this

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted this product by Haus Labs in exchange for an honest review.  I had never tried cream blush before, and this left a great first impression! I received the shades Glassy Lilac and Glassy Watermelon (I’m wearing Glassy Lilac in the photo). Both shades are absolutely stunning and I think this blends even easier than the powder blush (if that’s even possible). As with other Haus Labs products, a little does go a very long way. It’s easy to build up the color if you want a bolder look, but you can also go lightly if you want more subtle color. The fact that this blush is multipurpose makes it even better. I will definitely be adding this to my routine!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Haus Labs sent me two of these, the Glassy Pomelo & Pitaya! Super easy to apply, smooth, and color can be blended. The serum stick is a nice touch for anyone on the go needing a dab of color.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Haus labs sent me this as a beautiful gift to try out! I was kind of scared at first because it looks like i just put red lipstick all over my cheeks but it blends in very nicely and I like how I can take my time blending it in unlike a couple of other trendy blush stains on the market right now.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was hesitant about cream blushes because I had never tried them but these made a fantastic first impression! You don’t have to use much for it to be gorgeous, it also makes a beautiful lip color. I even tried a little on my eyelids and it was stunning

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This formula is a dream. It's lightweight and smooth making it so easy to blend. Perfect for a bright beat or a natural face. This blush shows up beautifully on my dark skin. I love the versatility that it offers. In this photo, I used it as a blush AND a lip product. I'm in love and putting it in my blush rotation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Firstly I want to thank Haus Labs for gifting me these blushes to try out! I will say BE LIGHT! A little dot of this blush goes a very long way!! I learned the hard way! Haha, but seriously this blush is so pigmented, and it’s very light weight! I used it alone on nothing but a bareface, and honestly it’s such a pretty shade, it felt so good on the skin too! I would highly recommend this blush for anyone that loves adding a pop of color to their makeup routine!!

reviews.review_title: Can’t wait to use all summer long!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My fav blush EVER. Just when you think Haus Labs has peaked in their innovation they find another way to wow us! This melts into the skin so beautifully and is SO pigmented. I usually use 2-3 taps with the Haus Labs multipurpose blush and it gives me the perfect color to my face. If you like a lot of blush with your look this is also a perf product for you! It goes on so glossy that it almost gives you a highlight effect. This is the perfect product for the summer! Thank you for the gift, haus labs :) (Reviewed by: Mase Griffith)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I loved this product so much!! It is perfect for summer if you want something easy to use to add color to your face. It glides onto the skin and is very easy to blend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was pleasantly surprised by this color. It’s such a fresh, bold shade & looks really nice with my skin tone. It makes my skin feel so good & hydrated. This was a gifted for review product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This blush is absolutely beautiful. The shade is perfect for a pinch of color on my skin. It feels so nourishing on my skin as well. This was gifted for a review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: *These were gifted to me by Haus Labs!*  Honestly I'm never usually a fan of cream blushes but this one is SO different from the rest!! I'm astonished by how it stays glassy even after setting everything with powder?! And the fact that it doesn't go on patchy even when I layer it with a bunch of different products that differ a lot in finish and formula! Honestly LOVEEE and I wouldn't usually use an orange color but this one was SOOOO pretty with the hibiscus color!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The color swatch is very pigmented, as a medium deep tone girl, it applied subtly allowing me to build it up more intensely or stay in a more everyday ware range which I normally go for. Since I model, I come across tons of matte blushes so this dewy and creamy color fuse blush balm was perfect for me because I love that all-day effortless summer glow.I applied the shade glassy tangelo on spf skin, it layered nicely leaving my skin feeling light and airy. It’s also long lasting with out feeling sticky, I put it to the test after 8hrs, my skin still felt hydrated.If you have sensitive skin then the more reason to consider trying it out.The ingredients are certified vegan and there’s no perfume smell.I’m already eyeing my next blush shade!! I was gifted this product by Haus labs for my honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted these products from haus labs  love that this product looks so natural on the skin it has a glossy finish and gives a very youthful lift to the apples of the cheeks and is versatile for use I highly recommend this blush stick along with the color fuse blushes in the compact

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted the shades glassy hibiscus (top) and glassy tangelo (bottom and on cheeks). The product blends out smoothly and easily using fingers or a blush. The blush is extremely pigmented and a little goes a long way. It lasted very long even through the heat without minimal setting spray

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin

Pomelo is a gorgeous everyday neutral shade! These blushes work great on their own, underneath powder, overtop of powder, overall I would buy more shades!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin

Pitaya is especially pigmented that you’ll hardly need any product! These blushes work great on their own, underneath powder, overtop of powder, overall I would buy more shades!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful texture, more of a balm than a stick so applies thin and feels weightless. Super buildable color payoff for either a wash of color or full pigment. Wears amazing throughout the day and doesn’t fade. These were gifted by Haus Labs for for review, but I will definitely have to pick more up!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Bought this on my own as a vib rouge. I don’t think it’s worth 34$. The glass like effect dissipated after 15-20 minutes. It is highly pigmented and lasts for hours. It’s just ok.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was delighted to receive two Color Fuse Blush Balm Sticks in exchange for my honest review and I am so happy I did!  I had never used a non-traditional type of blush before, but I was pleasantly surprised how much I liked the texture and how easy it was to apply and blend. It didn't make my face feel sticky and blended beautifully.  I received both the Glassy Pomelo and Glassy Pitaya shades. I really love the Pomelo as a blush and used the Pitaya shade as a lip gloss since it was a little bold for my usual day to day as a blush. I'm thrilled to have a product that makes a great 2-in-1 in my makeup bag now! I'd absolutely try out more shades for noth cheeks and lips! As a lip gloss, it is sheer but not unnoticeable and lasted a good while.

reviews.review_title: A must have for your daily routine!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the perfect blush. You can apply just a little for a clean look or apply more for a more enhanced look! I absolutely love it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have both the powder and stick blush now from Haus Labs. I absolutely love the stick blush! It's incredibly versatile and works both over and under powder. The creamy formula blends effortlessly, giving a natural, radiant finish that lasts all day. Having tried both the powder and stick blush from Haus Labs, I can confidently say they are fantastic products that deliver consistently stunning results. Highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: These beautifully pigmented and easily buildable balms are absolutely stunning! Thank you HAUS LABS for being so generous and kind and gifting me these 2 shades. The GLASSY LILAC (on the cheeks) was so easy to blend and build, and the GLASSY WATERMELON (on the lips) is one of my favorite shades of red.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin

I actually did a second layer to build it up and it still looked amazing. Definitely will repurchase when I run .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m a huge fan of the new lip/ cheek stick! I’m not a huge blush girl but I wanted to try something new. It’s super creamy and buildable if you want a more natural look or more full glam. Definitely recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Swipe on and tap out with my hands.  Takes 5 seconds and it looks awesome!! It's got a natural glow and  you can really build it up or leave it natural.  SO EASY! Hope they come out with a bronzer stick next!!! #Giften

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I cannot express how much I loved this product that was gifted to me by Haus Labs! I tried  two of the colors : Glassy Hibiscus & Glassy Tangelo. I honestly love how they both enhance my makeup for different occasions. I used GH for date night and GT for a family fun day!    Both lasted for hours and I mixed it with Haus Labs foundation & concealer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The first day I wore this product I got several compliments about how good my skin looked. The product wears wonderfully all day long! highly recommended

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Beautifull package but to small for the value, very dissappotment

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Haus Labs sent me two shades of the new Glassy Blush Balm Sticks. They are both so vibrant and beautiful. My favorite is Glassy Pomelo. I love a good peach blush and this one is everything!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Full disclosure: I was gifted product in exchange for an honest review. Today’s peachy makeup look is inspired by the newest product from the Haus. I’m wearing Haus Labs’ glassy blush balm in the shade glassy pomelo. It’s VERY pigmented so a little bit gives you a lot of color! I applied the balm using a blush brush to achieve a more natural, blended look; however, you can apply directly to the cheek for a more bold look. I was pleasantly surprised that this formula dried down as much as it did on my oily skin- I was expecting it to feel more wet. And guess what? Surprise! I’m also wearing it on my lips 🤭 it’s safe for cheeks and lips. Overall, I think I prefer the powder color fuse blush for everyday wear, but this formula is a fun change!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Haus labs sent me this product to review and I immediately fell in love. Its so hydrating and glossy without being sticky, literally every girls dream blush stick!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this shade and the lilac. These are so good! I love the color and finish it gives. Must have! Can’t wait to get more

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: *Gifted by HAUS LABS in exchange for my honest review* No complains! Just like the color fuse powdered blush this blush balm is super pigmented on goes on really smooth. I love the packaging too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have oily skin and wasn't sure how this was going to work with the name glassy. I am happy to report that it blended out beautifully,and sets on my skin without transferring off on my phone or my hands. This color would be gorgeous on deeper skin tones but I love it on my lips!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have oily skin and wasn't sure how this was going to work with the name glassy. I am happy to report that it blended out beautifully,and sets on my skin without transferring off on my phone or my hands. This color is beautiful on my fair skin, it's also beautiful on the lips.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Disclaimer: I received 2 shades of this product in exchange for my honest review.   I was really surprised by this product! At first I was hesitant as I am not the biggest fan of cream blush, but was pleasantly surprised by it! Although it is very pigmented, it blends seamlessly and is very buildable, so I recommend starting light to avoid over saturating with pigment.   What I really loved this product for was that it can be used on lips too! I added a touch of the glassy watermelon shade onto my lips and blended in for an extra pop of rosiness without the commitment or messiness of a lipstick or lip gloss. Great stuff!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is literally the BEST blush I have ever used. Blends in seamlessly and u don't need a lot either. The color is more pink than lilac on my skin tone but it's gorgeous either way. I will definitely buy more colors once it restocks.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Haus labs was so generous and gifted me color fuse glassy blush balm sticks!! I’m a self proclaimed blush girlie, so I was pumped to try Glassy Tangelo! The formula is sooo smooth and pigmented, so a little goes a long way. I got so many compliments and I can’t wait to try the rest of the shades when they’re out 🧡

reviews.review_text: I really loved these blush balms!! When it said 70% skincare and high pigment, I was a bit skeptical to be honest, but this product really packs a punch! When I set it with a light amount of powder, like I did in this photo, the color stayed the same all day long! Love the adaptability of this product, and would highly recommend.  *gifted by Haus Labs*

reviews.review_title: TRULY VERSATILE PRODUCT THAT CAN BE ANYTHING

reviews.review_text: This balm, long wear, hydrating stick can be used on lips, eyes, cheeks and more. Layer it with other house labs products to make even more vibrant and even longer lasting!!!!! Gifted By Haus Labs

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This formula has to be one of the best things to come out of 2024 so far and I’ll tell you why. I was gifted two shades (‘Glassy Rosette’ and ‘Glassy Acai’) of this product by Haus Labs but my review is not biased in any way.  Starting off with pigmentation - these are extremely pigmented yet easily blendable. Typically, super pigmented cream blush formulas tend to be difficult to blend out and work with but these blend out seamlessly. In the attached photos, I didn’t apply a lot on the cheeks (shade ‘Glassy Rosette’) and ended up with the most perfect natural flush with just the right amount of pigment. The finish on these are dewy and natural without being sticky. They melt into your base without lifting or disturbing your foundation underneath which is so important in a good cream/balm formula. These also give a natural plumping effect when applied. Yet Another unique quality of these is that they’re super versatile! I love how I can use this formula on both my cheeks and lips to create monochromatic looks. These being a 2-in-1 product essentially is very convenient. And to top it all off, these are infused with an array of hydrating and nourishing skincare ingredients! Definitely my new favorite blush formula without a doubt. They’re perfect for summer in every sense of the word!   Attached is a selfie of myself wearing the shade ‘Glassy Rosette’ on the cheeks and both ‘Glassy Acai’ and ‘Glassy Rosette’ on the lips. I’m also wearing the Triclone Skin Tech concealer in shade ‘01 Fair Neutral’. The two products mesh together beautifully. I loosely lined my lips with ‘Glassy Acai’, blended that out, and then blotted ‘Glassy Rosette’ in the center of my lips for a blurred, natural look. I’ve also included a picture of swatches of the two shades on my arm.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted  these blushes by Haus Labs in exchange for an honest review. These blushes did not fail to impress! I wasn’t expecting these to be as pigmented as they are; but WOW do they pack a punch! With them being balms, they effortlessly blend with a glass skin-like finish! I love the amount of shades available and am looking forward to picking up more colors myself! Wearing shade Glassy Tangelo

reviews.review_text: There's a lot of blush products on the market right now, but this balm formula is truly a game changer. Some liquid blushes are difficult to blend and easy to apply too much. Found one swipe across my cheeks delivered the right amount of product.  I even added some to my lips with a lip brush and some lip oil on top for an overall pinky punch look.  Though Haus gifted me the shade Pitaya and Pomelo I will be grabbing additional shades!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this item in exchange for an honest review. I personally was a little skeptical about this product. I tend to like single purpose items, but I understand the versatility and options a multi-purpose item can hold, especially when you’re on the go, and this item definitely has that. My initial reaction to seeing the product was that it follows the color scheme, imagery, and feel of the latest products. It was larger than I expected, which was nice since it made it easier to hold/grip, however opening and closing weren’t as smooth or easy (slightly cheapened the feel/experience). I did like that it had the color strip in the middle of the tube so you could see the shade whenever it’s sitting on your makeup counter without having to flip it over to find the one you want to use. As for use of this product, it was a definite first for me since I have only ever used powder blush (haven’t tried cream or liquid). Even with that lack of experience it was easy to apply and learn how to make it match my preferred look when it comes to blush application. It’s a buildable cream that didn’t streak, become patchy, or lift my foundation. I applied it directly to the cheek and diffused it out with a brush then softened the edges with my foundation sponge. Took a little time blending it out but I would chalk that up to my lack of technique and familiarity with balm blush over the actual product. Once applied for a good 30 minutes it felt as if I had balm/Vaseline on my cheeks yet once it completely dried down the feeling wasn’t as noticeable, almost became more powdery-like and held to my cheek. As for anyone with sensitive skin, I would say this is a safe try. I just came off a huge flare-up/breakout and this didn’t worsen or cause any further reaction. It’s gentle on the skin. Lastly, I tried using it on my lips. It felt soft, non-greasy or thick. Overall, I think it gives options outside the realm of powder blushes and is more cost-effective since it’s multifunctional.

reviews.review_title: An luxury formula with luxury ingredients

reviews.review_text: I was sent this by haus labs to review, and so far this is one of the best products from the brand. It delivers great pigment and radiance while being manageable and bendable. When I opened the tangelo orange blush i recieved, I was pleasantly surprised to see the color when opened was so vibrant it looked like a crayon. I have fair skin so I wasn't expecting an orange blush to work on my cheeks or lips, but it surprisingly looked great both ways! A truly beautiful formula and one of my favorite blushes of all time. I also love the skincare benefits as it makes me feel good to know the products I use are making a difference in my skin. While buying a 34 dollar blush is not a necessity, if you feel like splurging on a dewy blush this is the best option. The packaging is also very convenient and in line with their previous designs.

As for the product, it is insanely soft and creamy and does not lift any product underneath at all. It blends out beautifully and builds wonderfully as well. When you use a powder blush on top it layers amazingly as well. Alone its wonderfully glowy and glass-like and hydrating as well. Which is perfect for minimal makeup days. The added skincare benefits only add to the value of this skincare-makeup hybrid, and you are also able to twist past the inner tube to reveal a LOT of product.  Absolutely adore this product, another hit from the Haus!
