reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love! I tried them both on their own but I loved mixing  them both together ! I love Glassy Hibiscus for no make up days in the weekends  and just want some color on my cheeks  . I love Glassy Tangelo when I want to make a statement with my blush which is during the week ! They blend so beautifully! I wore them on 12 hour shifts and they were equally pigmented all day. I love how it just feels like my skin like everything else I have tried from hauslabs ! Thank you so much hauslabs for gifting me these products to review ! I will for-sure be purchasing more colors! The quality is so much better than other brands I have tried !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love! I tried them both on their own but I loved mixing  them both together ! I love Glassy Hibiscus for no make up days in the weekends  and just want some color on my cheeks  . I love Glassy Tangelo when I want to make a statement with my blush which is during the week ! They blend so beautifully! I wore them on 12 hour shifts and they were equally pigmented all day. I love how it just feels like my skin like everything else I have tried from hauslabs ! Thank you so much hauslabs for gifting me these products to review ! I will for-sure be purchasing more colors! The quality is so much better than other brands I have tried !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product from Haus Labs for an honest review.  I got Glassy Hibiscus and I honestly was a little put off by the color. Once I applied and blended it out it blended out to such a beautiful natural color. I love how easy it glides on and how easy it blends out with just fingers. I would love to try all the different shades.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted this product by Haus Labs and I loved it! I tried shade Acai and was a little scared by the dark color at first but it blended so well! The color payoff is gorgeous  and sutil. The Creamy formula is really nice And was easy to blend delivering a glowing blush.  I really like that you can also use it on your lips to match the color of your cheeks.  Definitely one of my new favorite blushes!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product is great. It is SO pigmented so it’ll last a really long time but not too pigmented where it doesn’t blend out. I’m always too afraid to buy orange blush but this one is just right. It’s stunning and it’s just bright enough without being overwhelming. The formula is hydrating and feels just like skin. Not sticky at all and really easy to build up if needed!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: 10/10!!! Im OBSESSED! At first I thought oh it’s just a balm not much pigment but omggg the pigmentation on these are incredible. Easy to blend and love the glossy finish!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This balm is amazing!! Everything I have been searching for in a blush. I’ve been using liquid blush but haven’t been really satisfied with them, and never considered a balm formula. The colors I received are pitaya and lilac, and both are gorgeous colors that blend easily on the skin and add a healthy glow. They even work together mixed. The color payoff lasts for ages - I applied in the morning, went on a road trip, had electrolysis done on my face, wore a face mask and came home that evening - and this blush was STILL vibrant! I found this balm much easier to apply the perfect amount and blend vs liquid. Packaging is easy to hold and apply. Overall I’m so happy with these, these will be a staple item in my routine!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love a good creme blush or balm, especially for summer because i feel like it stays on longer in the heat. I tried out Glassy Hibiscus while I was working today, a job where I’m constantly on the phone and resting my cheek on my hands and no movement! I also was moving around and sweating a bunch and this product didn’t feel like it was heavy and I wasnt itching to take it off after a long day. I cant wait to try it out during my holiday weekend at the beach! I was gifted this product by Haus Labs for my review. I was gifted Glassy Hibiscus and Glassy Tangelo.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely Love this!!!, blends Perfectly!!! THIS WAS GIFTED TO ME BY HAUS LABS FOR A REVIEW.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted this blush from Haus Labs and overall I loved it!  Blush is pictured without foundation (1st) and with foundation (2nd) it takes a little time to blend with foundation on hence 4/5, but still a fav!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Haus Labs gifted me two shades of their Color Fuse Glassy Blush Balms (Glassy Pomelo and Glassy Piyata) in exchange for an honest review. I’ve been on a blush kick lately, so this couldn’t have come at a more perfect time! The super sleek packaging and formula stood out to me. It’s super creamy, pigmented (a little goes a long way), and stays on all day! It’s a great option for the summer, as it’s very dewy and gives you such a gorgeous, healthy glow.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have the rosette color, it’s  very versatile. I like that it’s pigmented but very easy to adjust. It’s great for both a glam up look or a natural look :)

reviews.review_title: The Best Blush Balm on the Planet. Period!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am obsessed with this Color Fuse Glassy Blush Balm In Glassy Pitaya! I fell in love the moment I saw this unreal fuchsia, unlike any other I’ve seen in makeup like this! It’s very pigmented, and blends out beautifully! I used it on my lips, cheeks, and eyes and I feel like nothing is on my face. I love how dewy and radiant this finish is. I am in love! I can’t imagine this shade looking bad on anyone no matter the skin tone! I absolutely recommend getting your hands on this amazing lip and cheek balm!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: These are so easy to use even at a beginner level for makeup. Application is easy and gives a glassy finish. It is pigmented but not too much where application is difficult. I use this blush also as a lip stain because it feels hydrating and has really good color payout! It would recommend applying it with a brush.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The Cheek Blush Balm Stick is such a wonderful addition to my products. The product goes on smooth without disrupting my foundation underneath, and leaves a lovely dewy glow with a fabulous pop of color. What I love most is it's long lasting! With some other balm products after some time on your skin it can pull your other product off your skin, but the Haus Labs balm stick remained long lasting and kept it's great finish on my skin. A little goes a long way, which is perfect because a pop of color is what I prefer, and it also means I'll get a lot of use out of the product before needing to replace. The Glassy Hibiscus color was gorgeous, I loved it on my skin town paired with my foundation, highlighter and bronzer - it's the perfect addition! I felt bright and warm all day wearing this and I highlight recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was generously gifted this product to try and let me tell you, this did not disappoint! I used the shade glassy hibiscus with a little bit of glassy tangelo on top and this gave me the perfect sunkissed look.  The consistency was so creamy and smooth which I loved! I also really like how buildable this balm is because when I’m working on clients or on a shoot this lets me get the most out of one product (especially when we start more natural and go to a dramatic look!) I highly recommend! ooh also I used on my lips to try it out and it was the perfect natural lip color for me!

reviews.review_title: Perfect for a dewy skin look!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted this by Haus Labs in exchange for an honest review. I used Glassy Watermelon on both my cheeks and lips and loved how easily they blended out and how natural it looks on my cheeks; like their other products, this is very pigmented and a little goes a long way. I was worried about how it would be over powder but had no issues with it moving any product underneath it. If you’re looking for that natural dewy, glass skin, this blush is a must have!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I want to thank Haus Labs for gifting me these gorgeous Color Fuse Glassy Blush Balm for review. The packaging is absolutely stellar and sleek with 8 beautifully composed shades. I used the blush balm in “Glassy Watermelon” and buffed it out… I will admit, I do prefer the Color Fuse Blush over this, but still a fantastic product with easy convenience. I did however apply the Glassy Blush Balm in “Glassy Lilac” and finished it off with a top layer of my PHD Hyrbid Lip Oil and LOVED the results.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted this blush by Haus Labs, and I am so amazed. The formula is amazing ! Not drying, so creamy and beautiful on the skin. It lasts all day, and doesn’t disrupt the products under neath either. A huge plus is it also pairs so well with the Haus Labs powder blush too. I’m absolutely in love with the shades too. I kept on getting compliments on my blush all day! The perfect cream blush!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted these by Haus Labs. I’ve been on that standout cheek kick for quite sometime and it’s the perfect look for summer to look fresh and dewy. I love that most Haus Labs products have skincare that are going to help the skin while making it look beautiful. These are super pigmented so a little goes a long way. They are really blendable with a brush or beauty sponge. They have a great staying power with my combo skin, the colors are bright and easy to wear on different skin tones. Easy to dab on the lips to do that monochrome look. Perfect for a beautiful healthy glow.

reviews.review_title: These are a must have and are AMAZING!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: this product was gifted to me by haus labs in an exchange for an honest review! first i want to say wowww?! these are packed with pigment, to go from a light to sheer to a full coverage balm blush! it’s not sticky, doesn’t transfer, and lasts all day! my dry skin needs and loves this product!:) i absolutely loved glassy lilac! but then tried glassy watermelon and also fell in love because it can seem intimidating but i fell in love! definitely a 5 out of 5 stars for me!They also go great with the haus labs powder blush on top & there is so much product in it!! i’m sure this would look amaizng with a full face of haus labs as well:)❤️🩷

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the perfect crème blush. It gives you that really trendy glass skin that people have been dying for. The lavender shade is so gorgeous and is really unique. I had so many compliments on how professional my face looked! Thank you Haus Labs for gifting me this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Received this as a gift from Haus! And loved it! Really brought my face together for my friends special wedding day 💞

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Wow wow wow! I wore this both as a blush and swiped some on my lips as I was heading out the door. I got compliments on my makeup twice that day. Perfect coverage and is extremely blendable!

reviews.review_title: Fun, new way to wear blush!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I feel like Haus Labs is reading my mind cause I've been wanting a dewy blush that actually looked dewy without adding shimmer or felt sticky. I've tried a few liquid blushes but my skin just usually eats up the hydration and it ends up looking not as glowy and dewy. These are also very comfortable to wear on the lips if you like to match your lip color to your blush color. And at first I thought you only get a small stick of product but it actually twists up more and pushes up more from the inner tube.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I did my whole face and set it with powder. i added the blush and blended it with my hands. It didn't move my foundation at all! I was gifted this product my haus labs and am happy to say im so in love!! the color is so unique and perfect for my skin tone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love these blushes!! They are not too pigmented, so it’s not intimidating and beginner friendly..  I can keep building it up for more color. it’s so smooth and easy to blend. I also use it ob ny lips  and it gives such a pretty, cohesive look.  I wanna try more colors!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Thank you haus labs for the gift to review: I love this high shine blush balm. I wore it and got quite a few compliments for it, it’s smooth and long lasting, easily applied and bendable. You can also mix it with the color fuse powder blushes too using the dual ended brush. I love the bold colors I’m wearing glassy rosette here.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: i love these blushes because they stay true to a creamy formula but don’t sacrifice long wearing color AND keep the glassy dreamy dewy-ness throughout the day. the shades i were gifted were glassy pomelo and glassy açaí. these shades in particular are PERFECTION 🤌🏻

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted this product by HAUS LABS to try out, but when I say I would run to buy the other shades I mean it. I have glassy rosette and glassy acai and both are gorgeous, I was able to apply over my makeup without it lifting any product I love that you can customize the intensity of the color because sometimes I like my blush subtle

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Glassy pomelo is my favorite shade I received! Love how it looks and feels! New favorite blush and lip!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really love how colorful this shade it, I also enjoy that it feels so nice on skin because it is also skin care.

reviews.review_title: I didn’t think the powder blushes could be topped!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Haus Labs outdid itself with these glassy balm blushes. I didn’t think I could like them better than their powder blushes, but I do!   These blushes are incredibly pigmented (especially the darker colors) so you might need to apply less than you think. The serum base formulation with 70%+ skincare ingredients is evident as it melts into the skin, glides on with no effort, and blends easily with fingers or brush.   I tried shades Glassy Lilac and Glassy Watermelon (pictured), they are both beautiful vibrant colors that can be made to look natural (with a light hand) or bold.     The color is long lasting and even though I have oily skin, the blush still achieves that glassy effect without looking overly shiny or feeling greasy which is very impressive.   Haus labs generously gifted this product for an honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It is a creamy light weight blush balm that gives a tint of color and highlight for me. I would use this as an everyday blush as it applies and blends easily.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Kindly gifted this product for a review. Color shown is glassy hibiscus. This blush is great for everyday wear whether it’s a full face or a quick no makeup look. I enjoy it mostly for a natural “ clean girl “ look . I applied it with a brush and also placed it directly on the face and blended with fingers. Both methods blended seamlessly. It appears natural and glossy on the face, but is long lasting as well which makes this blush stand out amongst many others! This will be a staple for summer makeup along with the other shades !

reviews.review_title: My Go To Blush This Summer!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was sent this product from Haus Labs and it truly blew me away. The application is beautiful, the product blends seamlessly, and could be worn with anything from a bare face to a full beat.  I have combination skin, after blending I didn’t need to set the product and it lasted all day! My skin did not look oily or greasy. With this product my skin looks more radiant, hydrated, and I can’t wait to use these blushes all summer long!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love this blush for my acne prone skin. The color is beautiful and it made me feel confident. gaga strikes again! 10/10 would purchase

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this as a gift from Haus Labs. It is my first product from this brand and I am so wowed by it. It goes on so smoothly and blends so well. I love that it can be used for both the lips and cheeks. Definitely a summer must have.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was sent these new balm sticks in the shades Pitaya (left) and Lilac (right). I have been loving cool tones lately so I reached for the Pitaya after swatching both. I was so shocked to see how much color payoff I got on both shades in just a couple swipes on my arm!! The formula is super buildable and the staying power is incredible. I could still see the colors on my arm even after I showered. I always worry that these types of products will take off my base makeup once I apply/blend out, but did not have that issue whatsoever. Definitely recommend!!

WOW to say this product is incredible would be an understatement. Went in with low expectations and am so impressed - for the price point and the size this is amazing. So wearable and buildable, and long lasting! Love love love

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: SUCH a stunning shade - I am obsessed with how long lasting and blend able this is!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted 2 colors of the Fuse Glassy Blush Balm and loved the color Rosette! The packaging is so nice and the application couldn’t be easier. This will definitely be my go to blush!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I really liked this. It’s buildable but also easy to blend. I wore it for about 9 hours and it held up well over my foundation - no separation or lifting my foundation. Gave a nice natural color

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently received two blush balms from Haus Labs for testing, and I decided to try out the Glassy Lilac shade because it appeared to have more pink undertones. Let me tell you, I was blown away by its buildable formula and how effortlessly it blended into my skin. The pigment of this blush is truly out of this world.  I applied the blush balm over my liquid foundation, set everything in place, and even reapplied it over powder. Even when I reapplied it over powder, I was pleasantly surprised to find that it didn't disturb my base makeup. Instead, it added a beautiful glow to my cheeks, bringing life back to my complexion. The lasting power of this blush is superb, and I must admit, I'm completely obsessed with it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect glowy blush for the summer! Buildable and makes my skin look like glass even though I have texture. I topped it off with the matching powder blush, and it gave the perfect natural matte finish. #gifted

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been on the hunt for a dewy blush that lasts all day and this is it! I put it on before i went to work and it lasted until i washed it off before bed. The shades i got are perfect on their own and even better mixed together to find my perfect shade for my skin! 10/10 for me!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Açaí is a challenging color but perfect for those who want to try a purple blush! It’s buildable to your liking!

reviews.review_title: Dewy, compatible, and summer ready blush
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect, compatible on the go, this color fuse glassy lip and cheek blush balm has buildable coverage to give a dewy, flushed finish! I love the color glassy rosette for a wearable look

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was sent the shades Pomelo and Pitaya to review and I was really pleasantly surprised! I am usually hesitant with blush sticks because they are either draggy or hard to blend or difficult to get just the right amount of color build up you want or disturb my foundation as I'm applying but this one was great and did none of those things!  It was super glidey and smooth to apply and left a beautiful, natural skin-like glow. It was definitely hydrating to the skin and pretty water-resistant! Wore on my skin really well through the day. Even when I swatched the product on the back of my hand and washed my hands the color was still present.  It's definitely a sheer, buildable formula. I would not go into this expecting super high impact color payoff but that's actually what I like about it since it gives me more flexibility with how I want to use it.  I was pretty intimidated with the shade Pitaya for my skintone but ended up loving the sheerness so I could build it up.  Overall I'm super impressed with this formula and I will definitely be coming back for more shades.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Olive skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Haus Labs gifted me 2 beautiful blushes and I went with the glassy pomelo for my olive tone skin. It is a creamy light weight blush balm that gives a tint of color and highlight for me. I would use this as an everyday blush as it applies and blends easily.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I’m not the smartest with differentiating beauty products but I can say this product was made for me! I could use the same balm for my cheeks and lips. I love this shade it’s great for everyday!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Haus Labs sent me two of their new blush balms for review and I decided to test Glassy Pitaya. Upon application, it glides on smoothly and very blendable. I’ve only put on a small amount, but it’s buildable. Highly recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: This is my new go to blush! It goes on so smoothly, like butter and is very pigmented. The color is so pretty and perfect for summer. Definitely recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This formula is a dream. It’s so blendable and easy to apply, and can be used for a natural glow all the way to full glam. It’s my new favorite!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Run or click to get this when it comes out. I honestly will never go back to powdered blush after using the Glassy Hibiscus Blush Balm. So sultry and in this color on my skin was buildable. The texture alone and the color alone sells you. I loved both colors actually thank you Haus Labs! The Glassy Tangelo was also just as good just different glam. Since its a balm you get so much out of one bottle i was surprised how little i even used and i was building ok. 10/10
